languages.text: "Они были на обнаруженном мной судне, "Дарованном озарении". Внутри я нашел знаки, которые разведчики Волков оставляют для братьев. Зловещий вой посадил корабль на поверхность и ушел, а прочий экипаж исчез. Я шел по следу братьев, пока неведомый противник не заступил мне путь. И была битва".

"The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."
languages.original_text: "Они были на обнаруженном мной судне, "Дарованном озарении". Внутри я нашел знаки, которые разведчики Волков оставляют для братьев. Зловещий вой посадил корабль на поверхность и ушел, а прочий экипаж исчез. Я шел по следу братьев, пока неведомый противник не заступил мне путь. И была битва".

traits.locale_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Famehungry landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

"The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Famehungry landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

"The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Famehungry landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

"The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

languages.text: “我找到的那艘船‘神圣启示号’，就是他们搭乘的船。那艘船里有狼群的斥候给兄弟们留下的印记。怒嚎者降落到了那颗行星之后，就离开了飞船，其余的船员也消失不见了。我追随着兄弟们的足迹，但却被某个身份不明的敌人拦住了去路，于是我们打了一场。”
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: “我找到的那艘船，‘神圣启示号’就是他们的踪迹。那艘船里有狼群的斥候给兄弟们留下的印记。渴名者降落到了那颗行星之后，就离开了飞船，其余的船员也消失不见了。我追随着兄弟们的足迹，但却被某个身份不明的敌人拦住了去路，于是我们打了一场。”

languages.text: 「船を見つけた。レベレイション・グランテッド…同胞が乗ってたものだ。中にはウルフスカウトが同胞探しに出発した痕跡があった。破滅の咆哮は船を地表に着陸させたら出発したが、残っていた乗組員は消えたということだ。俺は同胞の痕跡を追ってたら、正体不明の敵に行く手を阻まれた。それで戦闘に入ったんだ」
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: 「船を見つけた。レベレイション・グランテッド…同胞が乗ってたものだ。中にはウルフスカウトが同胞探しに出発した痕跡があった。誉れある飢えは船を地表に着陸させたら出発したが、残っていた乗組員は消えたということだ。俺は同胞の痕跡を追ってたら、正体不明の敵に行く手を阻まれた。それで戦闘に入ったんだ」

languages.text: «La nave que encontré, la Revelación Concedida... fue cosa suya. En el interior estaban las señales que un Explorador Lobo deja para sus hermanos. Los miembros del Aullido Torvo aterrizaron en la superficie y se marcharon, mientras que el resto de la tripulación desapareció. Seguí el rastro de mis hermanos hasta que un enemigo desconocido me obstruyó el paso. Se produjo un combate».
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: «La nave que encontré, la Revelación Concedida... fue cosa suya. En el interior estaban las señales que un Explorador Lobo deja para sus hermanos. Los Hambrientos de Fama aterrizaron en la superficie y se marcharon, mientras que el resto de la tripulación desapareció. Seguí el rastro de mis hermanos hasta que un enemigo desconocido me obstruyó el paso. Se produjo un combate».

languages.text: « Le vaisseau que j'ai trouvé, le Révélation Accordée, était le leur. J'ai trouvé à l'intérieur des signes que les éclaireurs des Loups laissent à leurs frères. Je sais donc que les Hurleurs sanguinaires ont posé ce vaisseau à la surface puis sont partis quelque part. Quant au reste de l'équipage, il a disparu. J'ai suivi la piste de mes frères jusqu'à ce qu'un ennemi inconnu me barre la route et je l'ai combattu. »
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: « Le vaisseau que j'ai trouvé, le Révélation Accordée, était le leur. J'ai trouvé à l'intérieur des signes que les éclaireurs des Loups laissent à leurs frères. Je sais donc que les Dévoreurs de gloire ont posé ce vaisseau à la surface puis sont partis quelque part. Quant au reste de l'équipage, il a disparu. J'ai suivi la piste de mes frères jusqu'à ce qu'un ennemi inconnu me barre la route et je l'ai combattu. »

languages.text: "Das Schiff, das ich gefunden habe, die Revelation Granted ... das waren sie. Es gab darin Zeichen, dass Wolf-Späher aufgebrochen sind, ihre Brüder zu finden. Die Baleful Howl sind mit dem Schiff auf der Oberfläche gelandet und ausgezogen, und der Rest der Crew ist verschwunden. Ich bin der Fährte meiner Brüder gefolgt, bis ein unbekannter Feind mir den Weg versperrt hat. Und es kam zum Kampf."
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: "Das Schiff, das ich gefunden habe, die Revelation Granted – das waren sie. Im Inneren fand ich Zeichen, die Wolfspäher für ihre Brüder zurücklassen. Die Famehungry landeten das Schiff auf der Oberfläche und zogen los, der Rest der Crew verschwand. Ich folgte der Spur meiner Brüder, bis ein unbekannter Gegner mir den Weg versperrte. Und dann kam es zum Kampf."

languages.text: "Bulduğum Vahiy Verildi gemisi onlarmış. İçeride Kurt izcilerinin kardeşlerine bıraktığı izler vardı. Uğursuz Uluma gemiyi yüzeye bırakıp gitmiş, tayfanın geri kalanı da ortadan kaybolmuş. Bilinmez bir düşman yolumu kesene dek kardeşlerimin izini takip ettim. Ardından onunla savaştım."
languages.original_text: "The vessel I found, the Revelation Granted — that was them. Inside there were signs that Wolf scouts leave for their brothers. The Baleful Howl landed the ship on the surface and left, and the rest of the crew disappeared. I followed my brothers' trail until an unknown foe blocked my path. And battle ensued."

traits.locale_text: "Bulduğum Vahiy Verildi gemisi onlarmış. İçeride Kurt izcilerinin kardeşlerine bıraktığı izler vardı. Uğursuz Uluma gemiyi yüzeye bırakıp gitmiş, tayfanın geri kalanı da ortadan kaybolmuş. Bilinmez bir düşman yolumu kesene dek kardeşlerimin izini takip ettim. Ardından onunla savaştım."
